name: Alternative thumbnails
description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

name: Ambient mode control
description: Adds options to disable ambient mode and to bypass ambient mode restrictions.

name: Amoled
description: Applies a pure black theme to some components.

name: Bitrate default value
description: Sets the audio quality to 'Always High' when you first install the app.

name: Certificate spoof
description: Enables YouTube Music to work with Android Auto by spoofing the YouTube Music certificate.

name: Change Shorts repeat state
description: Adds an option to control whether Shorts should repeat, autoplay, or pause upon ending.

name: Change package name
description: Changes the package name for Reddit to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: Package name of Reddit
options.description: The name of the package to rename the app to.

name: Change player flyout menu toggles
description: Adds an option to use text toggles instead of switch toggles within the additional settings menu.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Change start page
description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

name: Custom Shorts action buttons
description: Changes, at compile time, the icon of the action buttons of the Shorts player.

options.title: Shorts icon style
options.description: The style of the icons for the action buttons in the Shorts player.

name: Custom branding icon for YouTube
description: Changes the YouTube app icon to the icon specified in options.json.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher.png
- ic_launcher_round.png

options.title: Change splash icons
options.description: Apply the custom branding icon to the splash screen.

options.title: Restore old splash animation
options.description: Restores old style splash animation.

name: Custom branding icon for YouTube Music
description: Changes the YouTube Music app icon to the icon specified in options.json.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_music_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_music_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher_release.png

options.title: Change splash icons
options.description: Apply the custom branding icon to the splash screen.

name: Custom branding name for Reddit
description: Renames the Reddit app to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: App name
options.description: The name of the app.

name: Custom branding name for YouTube
description: Renames the YouTube app to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: App name
options.description: The name of the app.

name: Custom branding name for YouTube Music
description: Renames the YouTube Music app to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: App name in notification panel
options.description: The name of the app as it appears in the notification panel.

options.title: App name in launcher
options.description: The name of the app as it appears in the launcher.

name: Custom double tap length
description: Adds 'double-tap to seek' values that are specified in options.json.

options.title: Double-tap to seek Values
options.description: A list of custom double-tap to seek lengths to be added, separated by commas.

name: Custom header for YouTube
description: Applies a custom header in the top left corner within the app.

options.title: Custom header
options.description:
The header to apply to the app.

Patch option 'Custom branding icon' applies only when:

1. Patch 'Custom branding icon for YouTube' is included.
2. Patch option for 'Custom branding icon for YouTube' is selected from the preset.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:

[Generic header]

- yt_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_wordmark_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 488px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 366px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 244px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 184px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 122px x 48px

[Premium header]

- yt_premium_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_premium_wordmark_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- drawable-xxxhdpi: 516px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 387px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 258px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 194px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 129px x 48px

name: Custom header for YouTube Music
description: Applies a custom header in the top left corner within the app.

options.title: Custom header
options.description:
The header to apply to the app.

Patch option 'Custom branding icon' applies only when:

1. Patch 'Custom branding icon for YouTube Music' is included.
2. Patch option for 'Custom branding icon for YouTube Music' is selected from the preset.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:

- action_bar_logo.png
- logo_music.png
- ytm_logo.png

The image 'action_bar_logo.png' dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 320px x 96px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 240px x 72px
- drawable-xhdpi: 160px x 48px
- drawable-hdpi: 121px x 36px
- drawable-mdpi: 80px x 24px

The image 'logo_music.png' dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 576px x 200px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 432px x 150px
- drawable-xhdpi: 288px x 100px
- drawable-hdpi: 217px x 76px
- drawable-mdpi: 144px x 50px

The image 'ytm_logo.png' dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 412px x 144px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 309px x 108px
- drawable-xhdpi: 206px x 72px
- drawable-hdpi: 155px x 54px
- drawable-mdpi: 103px x 36px

name: Custom package name
description: Changes the package name for the non-root build of YouTube and YouTube Music to the name specified in options.json.

options.title: Package name of YouTube
options.description: The name of the package to use in GmsCore support.

options.title: Package name of YouTube Music
options.description: The name of the package to use in GmsCore support.

name: Description components
description: Adds options to hide and disable description components.

name: Disable QUIC protocol
description: Adds an option to disable CronetEngine's QUIC protocol.

name: Disable auto audio tracks
description: Adds an option to disable audio tracks from being automatically enabled.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Disable auto captions
description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

name: Disable dislike redirection
description: Adds an option to disable redirection to the next track when clicking the Dislike button.

name: Disable haptic feedback
description: Adds options to disable haptic feedback when swiping in the video player.

name: Disable resuming Shorts on startup
description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

name: Disable screenshot popup
description: Adds an option to disable the popup that appears when taking a screenshot.

name: Disable splash animation
description: Adds an option to disable the splash animation on app startup.

name: Enable OPUS codec
description: Adds an options to enable the OPUS audio codec if the player response includes.

name: Enable OPUS codec
description: Adds an options to enable the OPUS audio codec if the player response includes.

name: Enable debug logging
description: Adds an option to enable debug logging.

name: Enable debug logging
description: Adds an option to enable debug logging.

name: Enable external browser
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

name: Enable gradient loading screen
description: Adds an option to enable the gradient loading screen.

name: Enable landscape mode
description: Adds an option to enable landscape mode when rotating the screen on phones.

name: Enable open links directly
description: Adds an option to skip over redirection URLs in external links.

name: Flyout menu components
description: Adds options to hide or change flyout menu components.

name: Force hide player buttons background
description: Removes, at compile time, the dark background surrounding the video player controls.

name: Fullscreen components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to fullscreen.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows patched Google apps to run without root and under a different package name by using GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

name: GmsCore support
description: Allows patched Google apps to run without root and under a different package name by using GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

name: Hide Recently Visited shelf
description: Adds an option to hide the Recently Visited shelf in the sidebar.

name: Hide Shorts dimming
description: Removes, at compile time, the dimming effect at the top and bottom of Shorts videos.

name: Hide account components
description: Adds options to hide components related to the account menu.

name: Hide action bar components
description: Adds options to hide action bar components and replace the offline download button with an external download button.

name: Hide action buttons
description: Adds options to hide action buttons under videos.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to hide ads.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to hide ads.

name: Hide ads
description: Adds options to hide ads.

name: Hide animated button background
description: Removes, at compile time, the background of the animated pause and play buttons in the Shorts player.

name: Hide comments components
description: Adds options to hide components related to comments.

name: Hide double tap overlay filter
description: Removes, at compile time, the dark overlay that appears when double-tapping to seek.

name: Hide double tap overlay filter
description: Removes, at compile time, the dark overlay that appears when double-tapping to seek.

name: Hide double tap to like animations
description: Removes, at compile time, the like animations that appear when double-tapping in the Shorts player.

name: Hide feed components
description: Adds options to hide components related to feeds.

name: Hide feed flyout menu
description: Adds the ability to hide feed flyout menu components using a custom filter.

name: Hide layout components
description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

options.title: Force hide voice search button
options.description: Permanently hide the voice search button with the legacy method.

name: Hide layout components
description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

name: Hide navigation buttons
description: Adds options to hide buttons in the navigation bar.

name: Hide overlay filter
description: Removes, at compile time, the dark overlay that appears when player flyout menus are open.

name: Hide player buttons
description: Adds options to hide buttons in the video player.

name: Hide player flyout menu
description: Adds options to hide player flyout menu components.

name: Hide player overlay filter
description: Removes, at compile time, the dark overlay that appears when single-tapping in the player.

name: Layout switch
description: Adds an option to spoof the dpi in order to use a tablet or phone layout.

name: MaterialYou
description: Applies the MaterialYou theme for Android 12+ devices.

name: Miniplayer
description: Adds options to change the in app minimized player, and if patching target 19.16+ adds options to use modern miniplayers.

name: Navigation bar components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the navigation bar.

name: Navigation bar components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the navigation bar.

name: Open links directly
description: Adds an option to skip over redirection URLs in external links.

name: Open links externally
description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

name: Overlay buttons
description: Adds options to display overlay buttons in the video player.

options.title: Icon type
options.description: The icon type.

options.title: Bottom margin
options.description: The bottom margin for the overlay buttons and timestamp.

name: Player components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the player.

name: Player components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the video player.

name: Premium icon
description: Unlocks premium app icons.

name: Remove background playback restrictions
description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

name: Remove background playback restrictions
description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including playing kids videos in the background.

name: Remove subreddit dialog
description: Adds options to remove the NSFW community warning and notifications suggestion dialogs by dismissing them automatically.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

name: Restore old style library shelf
description: Adds an option to return the Library tab to the old style.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of songs using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: Return YouTube Dislike
description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Adds an option to remove tracking query parameters from URLs when sharing links.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Adds an option to remove tracking query parameters from URLs when sharing links.

name: Sanitize sharing links
description: Adds an option to remove tracking query parameters from URLs when sharing links.

name: Seekbar components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the seekbar.

name: Settings for Reddit
description: Applies mandatory patches to implement ReVanced Extended settings into the application.

options.title: RVX settings menu name
options.description: The name of the RVX settings menu.

name: Settings for YouTube
description: Applies mandatory patches to implement ReVanced Extended settings into the application.

options.title: Insert position
options.description: The settings menu name that the RVX settings menu should be above.

options.title: RVX settings menu name
options.description: The name of the RVX settings menu.

name: Settings for YouTube Music
description: Applies mandatory patches to implement ReVanced Extended settings into the application.

options.title: RVX settings menu name
options.description: The name of the RVX settings menu.

name: Shorts components
description: Adds options to hide or change components related to YouTube Shorts.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments, such as non-music sections.

name: SponsorBlock
description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments, such as sponsored content.

options.title: Outline icons
options.description: Apply the outline icon.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds options to spoof the YouTube Music client version. This can remove the radio mode restriction in Canadian regions or disable real-time lyrics.

name: Spoof app version
description: Adds options to spoof the YouTube client version. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features.

name: Spoof client
description: Adds options to spoof the client to allow video playback.

name: Swipe controls
description: Adds options to enable and configure volume and brightness swipe controls.

name: Theme
description: Changes the app's theme to the values specified in options.json.

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

name: Toolbar components
description: Adds options to hide or change components located on the toolbar, such as toolbar buttons, search bar, and header.

options.title: Force hide voice search button
options.description: Permanently hide the voice search button with the legacy method.

name: Translations for YouTube
description: Add translations or remove string resources.

options.title: Custom translations
options.description:
The path to the 'strings.xml' file.
Please note that applying the 'strings.xml' file will overwrite all existing translations.

options.default: ar, el-rGR, es-rES, fr-rFR, hu-rHU, it-rIT, ja-rJP, ko-rKR, pl-rPL, pt-rBR, ru-rRU, tr-rTR, uk-rUA, vi-rVN, zh-rCN, zh-rTW
options.title: Translations to add
options.description: A list of translations to be added for the RVX settings, separated by commas.

options.default: af, am, ar, ar-rXB, as, az, b+es+419, b+sr+Latn, be, bg, bn, bs, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-rAU, en-rCA, en-rGB, en-rIN, en-rXA, en-rXC, es, es-rUS, et, eu, fa, fi, fr, fr-rCA, gl, gu, hi, hr, hu, hy, id, in, is, it, iw, ja, ka, kk, km, kn, ko, ky, lo, lt, lv, mk, ml, mn, mr, ms, my, nb, ne, nl, no, or, pa, pl, pt, pt-rBR, pt-rPT, ro, ru, si, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, sw, ta, te, th, tl, tr, uk, ur, uz, vi, zh, zh-rCN, zh-rHK, zh-rTW, zu
options.title: String resources to keep
options.description:
A list of string resources to be kept, separated by commas.
String resources not in the list will be removed from the app.

Default string resource, English, is not removed.

name: Translations for YouTube Music
description: Add translations or remove string resources.

options.title: Custom translations
options.description:
The path to the 'strings.xml' file.
Please note that applying the 'strings.xml' file will overwrite all existing language translations.

options.default: bg-rBG, bn, cs-rCZ, el-rGR, es-rES, fr-rFR, hu-rHU, id-rID, in, it-rIT, ja-rJP, ko-rKR, nl-rNL, pl-rPL, pt-rBR, ro-rRO, ru-rRU, tr-rTR, uk-rUA, vi-rVN, zh-rCN, zh-rTW
options.title: Translations to add
options.description: A list of translations to be added for the RVX settings, separated by commas.

options.default: af, am, ar, ar-rXB, as, az, b+es+419, b+sr+Latn, be, bg, bn, bs, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-rAU, en-rCA, en-rGB, en-rIN, en-rXA, en-rXC, es, es-rUS, et, eu, fa, fi, fr, fr-rCA, gl, gu, hi, hr, hu, hy, id, in, is, it, iw, ja, ka, kk, km, kn, ko, ky, lo, lt, lv, mk, ml, mn, mr, ms, my, nb, ne, nl, no, or, pa, pl, pt, pt-rBR, pt-rPT, ro, ru, si, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, sw, ta, te, th, tl, tr, uk, ur, uz, vi, zh, zh-rCN, zh-rHK, zh-rTW, zu
options.title: String resources to keep
options.description:
A list of string resources to be kept, separated by commas.
String resources not in the list will be removed from the app.

Default string resource, English, is not removed.

name: Video playback
description: Adds options to customize settings related to video playback, such as default video quality and playback speed.

name: Video playback
description: Adds options to customize settings related to video playback, such as default video quality and playback speed.

name: Visual preferences icons
description: Adds icons to specific preferences in the settings.

options.title: RVX settings menu icon
options.description: Apply different icons for RVX settings menu.
